name: Game Over!
description:
You find yourself in a room  with a timer counting down, it's inevitable... you're going to die.

'H-hel-hello?' You hear a familiar voice entering your ear. 'I can't see anything, what's going on?'. It's a friend of yours, you start feeling comfortable - that is, until you remember the countdown in front of you, leading you to move into the next room in front of you.

Game Over! is a puzzle platformer game with very similar mechanics to that of Keep Talking and Nobody Explodes. You and another (or more) friend must work together in progressing through the puzzle rooms to survive as long as you can. It may feel hopeless, but maybe, just maybe, you can decipher a way out along the way!

The manual reader MUST download the GameOverPuzzleManual.pdf file, whilst the player can play the game in either a browser, or by downloading the game themselves.

How long can you survive...?

Made for the Multiplayer Game Jam 2022

The game, alongside all art assets, created by AcidicDuck

All rights to sound effects and music were acquired.
